title: I'm putting a crusade on purging feeders
body: I'm done with feeders. I'm gonna make sure they won't play for their feeding nature. Of course feeders love to lose so why not ban them? Why not just throw the games and make the feeders happy for their misdeeds? You know why? CUZ THEY ARE NOT PLAYERS. They are random people who love to troll and lose every single game. I'm purging every players who love to feed. And I mean banning them.

replies.body:
Why not do the thing feeders/troll hate the most
Win
simply just win every game you have a feeder or troll, now they're sad and you have enacted your revenge
SUFFER NOT THE FEEDER TO LIVE
